summary: Diff updates the auth-related UI/guard components to (a) hide or relabel login affordances on patient pages and (b) show medical-team-specific messaging/CTA on protected routes. No clear gaps are observable from the provided diff summary, though route-level protection/public access cannot be fully verified because the router setup (e.g., App.tsx) is not included in the diff content.

hallucinated_features.description: Header adds an authenticated-only PATIENT vs MEDICAL TEAM view toggle (segmented navigation) that is not explicitly requested by REQ-11/REQ-12.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-11/REQ-12 focus on access rules and messaging (public patient routes; protected medical-team routes). The new toggle is additional navigation UI beyond those requirements.
